dcterms:creator: S. Han
J. Gao
F. Ciravegna
dcterms:description: The PHEME dataset contains rumor and non-rumor tweets about five incidents: Charlie Hebdo, Germanwings crash, Ottawa shooting, Sydney siege, and Ferguson, which occurred between 2014 and 2015. It is used to identify possible rumor spreaders by transforming the dataset through weak supervised learning.
dcterms:title: PHEME dataset
